name: John Bosch
text:
good taste pizzas. alot of choises of toping
good prices. taste good thin crust or thick
lovely chicken pizza or 6 cheese one

name: Juma Hamdan
text: Amazing pizza great customer service especially Tesheana, she was amazing. She took her time explaining toppings for the pizza as well as the wings with sauces. She was very polite on the phone and even more when i picked up my order. The best thin pizza in town

name: David Hopp
text: Ordered med on Sunday night from a very nice person, gave me a good deal because I didn't want 2 large pizzas deal. Called Tues night... Manager (I assume) answered... Sounded like it was a real pain in the butt to have to take my order. I …More

name: Tonia Reaves
text: False Advertising. Didn't honor coupon. Blaming it on Jewel Food store. The coupon prints in the back of Jewel receipts for advertisement

name: Go Blue
text: Eugene took my delivery order over the phone and was very kind and respectful. It was my first time calling this restaurant and he helped me with the menu and in identifying the best pizza for my taste. He also cooked the pizza himself and …More

name: Abigail Avila
text: Tesheana H. Has the best customer service skills! I walked in to buy a pizza to go, the computers were not working. She offered to make it on the house! Thank you!!! I will definitely return!

name: Jesse Stiles
text: Made an order on a Saturday, when it says the store is open until 1 am. Call to ask about a sauce on the order, only to be told that the store infact is not open, as well as my order has been cancelled because they want to close early. Even as someone in the industry, this is laziness at it's finest and I won't be ordering again.

name: Cheyna Langston
text: Friendly staff and very upbeat. Always helpful and very informational when it comes to any questions I have when placing my order. I know I look at reviews from other places with comments but some are unreal on how far to stretch out a story about something. Plain and simple about things.

name: Bernard Tarver
text: Placed an order online way before the delivery time cutoff, and got an call afterwards and was told they're no longer delivering for the night.  What a joke.

name: Nade Tambik
text: First time to carry out, great and delicious pizza ,the wings were also very tasty ,the associate very helpful

name: Michael Palmquist
text:
Justin Terry had a very hard time understanding the person taking the order.
Nick Pancione believes the crust was bland.  Sarah Badawi thought it sucked
Dylan Thomas thought the sausage tastes like cardboard.  I'm not sure what …More

name: Cathy F
text: Service gets a five! Employee grabbed my five pizzas and went straight to the door to put the pizzas in my car without being asked. The actual pizzas get a three but they were better than the other chains that offer economy pizzas.

name: Khrystal Austin
text: Employee was very rude when I came into store to pick up the food. Would never go back here

name: Supgrailed
text: Hello, this is jose and I ordered two pepperoni pizzas and I was given two cheese pizzas. When I tried calling no one was answering and ignoring me and I was constantly being put on hold and talking to different people. One of there …More

name: Trey King
text: Eryk is always there to help me with my problems , rather they be pizza related or not . He is the light at the end of the tunnel, the last bite , a breath of fresh air . Sometimes I buy pizza just to talk to him, for he is one that shall be idolized . He’s a great guy . xoxo

name: Christine Saide
text: Last time I ordered for pick up they forgot a whole Medium sized pizza and my sister had to go back. Waiting for my delivery now but its been "on its way" for almost an hour. Someone called to notify me that my pizza originally went out …More

name: agata verkyte
text: This place was horrible!  I made an order for delivery... they said they’d be in an hour. I waited and hour and a half and decided to call and ask what was taking so long. They said the driver “called” and someone picked up and started …More

name: Bob Vercillo
text: Not my favorite pizza.  But 2.99 for a 12" pizza is a really good deal!

name: Joseph Sturge
text: Awesome service, by Madeline wow, great pizza, 2 thumbs way up, I recommend it it’s great...

name: James Sullivan
text: Their chicken Alfredo pizza is the bomb.

name: David Davidson
text: Will never stop here again, very rud people pizza wasn't done.

name: Veronica Lozano
text: If I could rate them 0 stars I would. Claimed it was flooded and raining so bad, yet I just drove home and it was fine out. Also claimed it took 30 mins to make a pizza. I’ve worked at pizza stores and at most it takes 7-10 mins. Go elsewhere and steer clear of this Papa John’s. Rude and unprofessional!

name: Dan Korte
text: Ordered some pizzas online, 45 mins later..... an employee calls to tell us that they do not deliver to our area this late in the day. I ordered at 7:12 i didn't know that was so late but if you dont deliver to here thats fine, the problem …More

name: 32212kshine@gmail.com Lowend
text: Just needed to the debt pad fiexed please

name: Greg Biz
text: The employees were nice employees at this location.

name: Ajit Dadlani
text: Horrible...placed an order at 951pm...tracker said 1027pm arrival...called at 1040 (said they just left)...then called at 1111pm and they said 10 more minutes...manager said sorry and couldnt offer me a discount or anything...will never order from here again...they were rude and took forever

name: Paul Girzynski
text: wouldnt complete a delivery because they are lazy never ordering from here or any location ever again

name: Jonathon Magic
text: Decent food fair price

name: DENIS Gurov
text: 10:37 PM they olredy close,  7/30/19

name: Chuck Swing
text: James and Akmed are polite and friendly very passionate to do good gentlemen. The pizza was pretty good by Pappa John's standards but the customer service was far better than other locations.

name: Eric Sorensen
text: Soggy pizza but if you need somethibg fast it's open

name: Eugene Guerin
text: Great product made the way you want it.

name: Kathy Jones
text: Not good at all! Found hair in my pizza!!! Of course the guy that delivered it to me had a face full of hair!! Yuck!! On top of that he was not friendly at all! Won’t order from here again.

name: Ted Nunez
text: You took an hour and forty min to deliver a cold pizza to Me last night.  The best part of ordering from you was throwing your pizza in the garbage.

name: KevinTM
text: Nice experience great service

name: anemariah
text: Don’t like this pizza at all.

name: Aaron-Catof9Lives
text: Their pizza is always good and fast.

name: Dwayne Frazier
text: Really small place

name: Darko Kitanovksi
text: Slow and unfriendly stuff, waiting for delivery 2hours .

name: Asim Kamal
text: We enjoyed the pizza.

name: Kc Child
text: It was ok for what was around...

name: Hiram Gavin
text: No comment

name: Jacob Hamrick
text: Driving a truck sometimes you get stuck at a customer. Delivery was on time and I got what I ordered. =)

name: Jim Jones
text: The pizza is always good but sometimes the customer service is great and sometimes it's terrible

name: Donald Schultz
text: I ordered 5 pizza's for my crew working today and they alert 20 minutes late even when they gave me a time line of at most an hour. Even though that I still received the pizza's my employee's are almost done with their breaks and could barely eat.

text:

Están buenas las pastas.
